modName: CSS restyles for NexusMods Skyrim website
summary: This changes the CSS styling of NexusMods.com/Skyrim from the default dark theme to a minimal light or dark theme.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Notice:[/b]
Instructions have changed and Firefox is now supported! I recommend Stylish since it works for both Firefox/Chrome, and lets you install new styles (from userstyles.org) at the click of a button.

[b]Description:[/b]
This changes the CSS styling of NexusMods.com/Skyrim from the default dark theme to a light minimal theme.

Why? Minimal themes are cool and it allows the website to behave more smoothly in your browser, especially over remote desktop, since there are less graphics to render.

Yes, you will still see the background image for a split second before the styling kicks in.

Yes, there might be some old styling or invisible text here and there (white text on white background) because I haven't styled everything on the site yet.

[b]Instructions:[/b]
- Install Stylish for: [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/stylish/]Firefox[/url] | [url=https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe?hl=en]Chrome[/url]
- Choose a theme: [url=http://userstyles.org/styles/100313/nexusmods-skyrim-light-theme]Light[/url] | [url=http://userstyles.org/styles/100326/nexusmods-skyrim-dark-theme]Dark[/url]
- Click "Install with Stylish".
- Done!

[b]Roadmap:[/b]
- Fix more of the styles

[b]Bonus:[/b]
I make royalty-free video game music, you can use it in your mods or vids or remixes etc without any license as long as you include my name in the credits. If you want to add songs to Skyrim I recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13286/?]Personalized Music[/url].

Full song stream/download in mp3 format:
[url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/fantasy.mp3]Fantasy[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/vanish.mp3]Vanish[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/placid.mp3]Placid[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/piano%201.mp3]Piano 1[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/box.mp3]Box[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20singles/undone.mp3]Undone[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/barren%20scrapyard%202.mp3]Barren Scrapyard 2[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/artificial%20intercourse.mp3]Artificial Intercourse[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20remixes/Brinstar%20Failed.mp3]Brinstar Failed[/url] | [url=http://files.glassocean.net/music%20productions/iosys%20-%20concepts/life%20expectancy.mp3]Life Expectancy[/url]

Styles range from dull to epic; lo-fi, trip-hop, ambient; feel free to chop or loop the parts you like. Headphones recommended.
author: hectavex
